   --=| THE WANDULATOR |=--

TR 1 IS PRIME CLOCK
CV 1 IS RANDOM 0-10V



#1
I > RAND 15 14
IF I: CV 1 V RAND 10

#2

#3

#4

#5

#6

#7

#8

#M
EV 113: TR.P 1
EV 127: TR.P 1
EV 163: TR.P 1
EV 173: TR.P 1
EV 191: TR.P 1
$ 1

#I
TR.TIME 1 10
CV.SLEW 1 50
M 60
M.ACT 1

#P
